#summary Returns a list of users that have added the given user as a friend, and current session information for each of those users.
#labels Protocol-User

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||GetFriendedBy||String||Yes||
||`UserID`||Retrieve user and session information for each user that has friended this given user||UUID||Yes||

{{{
RequestMethod=GetFriendedBy
&UserID=efb00dbb-d4ab-46dc-aebc-4ba83288c3c0
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`Success`||True if a FriendedBy array was returned, False if a Message was returned||Boolean||
||`FriendedBy`||Array of friend objects, see below||Array||
||`Message`||Error message||String||

== Friend Object ==

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`UserID`||UUID for the user account||UUID||
||`Name`||Account name||String||
||`Email`||Account e-mail address||String||
||`AccessLevel`||0-255 value indicating the access level of this user. Described in more detail on the AccessLevel page||Integer||
||`SessionID`||Current session identifier||UUID||
||`SecureSessionID`||Current session identifier that must only be transmitted across secure channels||UUID||
||`SceneID`||UUID of the scene that the user is currently in||UUID||
||`ScenePosition`||Scene-relative current position of the user||Vector3d||
||`SceneLookAt`||Normalized direction vector where the user is currently looking||Vector3d||
||`ExtraData`||Free form JSON data attached to this user's session||JSON||
